attributes.action: Stop politicians renting out their property to claim expenses on hotels.
attributes.additional_details: With the NHS struggling, public services being cut to the bone some MP's are abusing the expenses they are entitled to by renting out their property near Westminster and claiming expenses for hotels, surley this has to stop.
attributes.background: Several MP's have been claiming expenses for hotels, while renting out their property near Westminster.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: 

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
